content.rendered:
...Tap into unlimited possibilities

Welcome

UPSS Schools as of today started as UPSS Comprehensive College in October 1994 in Shasha, Akowonjo, Lagos State. In September 2007 following the success of the Secondary school, the preschool and primary was established in response to the demand of the College parents and our immediate community.

Pacific Academy, Shagari Village, Akure was established in September 2012 as a means of providing increased choices for a world-class education in a state where quality education is most cherished and desired.

Today, all three schools operate as one in two campuses, Lagos and Akure, with UPSS Comprehensive College alongside the Preschool and Primary being in the while Pacific Academy is in Shagari village, Akure, Ondo State. The Preschool takes care of children from 18 months to 5 years while the primary is from age 5 to 10 years. The Secondary school which is divided into the junior and senior secondary is from age 10 to 16. At the end of the senior secondary, students are able to write the SSCE, SAT, TOEFL and IELTS. The Sixth Form which takes care of the A-Level, UTME, SAT & TOEFL is part of both campuses and is from age 16 to 18.

Learn more Lessen

Visit

Please find the campus closest to you from the options listed below

Pacific Nursery & Primary school Lagos

Pacific Academy Akure

UPSS Comprehensive College, Lagos

Pacific Sixth Form College Lagos / Akure

Meet The Chairman of UPSS Schools

Omosowon
Idowu Remigious,
--
Chairman UPSS Schools

(B.Sc, M.B.A, C. Ed)

I warmly welcome intending pupils of UPSS Schools, Lagos and Akure to Nigeria’s leading secondary school. We have behind us two decades of success and monumental achievements in academics, sports, music and drama.

UPSS Schools continue to offer a world class education using state-of-the-art facilities in environments that are serene, efficient and up to date in modern learning facilities.

Our students enjoy the services of professionally qualified teachers and the benefit of modern learning techniques using internet facilities. Our facilities and programs provide a welcoming environment thereby making your stay in UPSS Schools an enjoyable and memorable experience.

In our several years of existence, we have given effect to the realization of the dreams and aspirations of our students many of whom are graduates in many fields of endeavour with many in United State and United Kingdom Colleges pursuing post graduate’s studies.

Our goal is to continue to produce well rounded students who will be able to compete anywhere in the world. We shall continue to teach good character by modelling and fostering compassion, respect, responsibility and integrity. In addition, our students will be challenged to pursue knowledge, creativity, and intellectual self-reliance. We engage in community development and understand students’ rights and responsibilities within a community that is itself part of the larger world.

As director of UPSS Schools, it is my desire to continue to create a school community in which every student can be successful and to positively impact students’ learning by supporting the teachers and other staff of the school to deliver on this promise. My several years of experience as a lecturer in the University and the Polytechnic and a good understanding of the US and British Curricula at this level, has helped in shaping our desire for an international education.

We provide a good blend of the Nigerian and American Curriculum at the Senior Secondary level. This way we are able to produce truly international students.

In all, Pacific School is a great place for students of all ages (2-18) to learn from preschool to Sixth Form.

We support all our students in their learning and provide them with the skills necessary to become successful, creative and fulfilled leaders of society.

It is thus my pleasure to invite you to join the Pacific family and experience a world class education in a fun-filled environment.

Omosowon
Idowu Remigious,
--
Chairman UPSS Schools

(B.Sc, M.B.A, C. Ed)

Join us and experience

OPPORTUNITY

We create the chance for students to learn, deepen their knowledge and build skills in leadership, Critical thinking and enhance professional prospects.​

CHALLENGE

Academic work in UPSS Schools is challenging and rigorous but with support from dedicated teachers and the home, success is assured.

INNOVATION

At UPSS Schools, we do not only emphasize doing things differently and learning to think outside the box, we also provide an innovative approach to teaching, embracing new technologies and enhanced curriculum delivery.

EXCITEMENT

We believe that school should be exciting and filled with activities; hence every student will have the chance to express himself in sports, drama, music and fun activities.​​

SUPPORT

The school will support each student to learn using his preferred learning styles.​

ADVANCEMENT

Your stay in either campus of UPSS Schools will guarantee your successful progression to the next level. Each of our students will become a good global Citizen who will make meaningful contribution to society.​

Track Record

Teacher to student
1 -7
Campuses
2
Years of operations
10

Over 98% University admission rate

Over 98% University admission rate

Students enrolled to-date
0

Our Products

Play Video
Play Video

UPSS Schools is one of the top secondary schools in Lagos State. View more

Latest News

UPSS Schools Valedictory Service 2024: Celebration of achievement and future aspirations

Celebrating Excellence: Adenike Adepetu Emerges as First Runner-Up in I Beg to Differ Debate Competition.

Career Day 2024: Exploring a World of Possibilities

Christmas Party 2023 Edition

2023 Valedictory Service

2023 Cultural Day Celebration

Biennial Inter-House Sports Competition 2023 Edition.

Valedictory Service 2022 At UPSS Schools

Career Day Activities

See all blog post
UPSS Comprehensive College is a school that believes strongly in the individual talents of every child. A school that discovers and enhances the potential of every student while inculcating untradeable academic knowledge. Schooling here has contributed immensely to my moral and academic growth and development. I would not trade my experience here at Pacific for anything in the world.
Odeyiany Naomi AhuoizaEx-student
They say that the longer you stay in a place, the more impact it'll have on you. That is what Pacific has done to me. It has impacted me positively in academics and even socially. At Pacific, I have been encouraged to join a number of clubs and societies, which I never felt motivated to do until I came to Pacific. I have also had a profound educational improvement thanks to Pacific College, so much so I achieved an outstanding WAEC result. I thank Pacific for the changes in me. It doesn't just change a person; it changes that person for the better.
Ibhaze DivineEx-student
UPSS Comprehensive College challenged me academically, pushing me to develop strong study habits and critical thinking skills. It also introduced me to lifelong friends who have been source of support and companionship. Overtly, my secondary school experience has left me with lasting friendships and the tools I need to excel in my higher education and beyond.
Amos EmmanuelEx-student
Pacific has been a very amazing school. It has become such a part of the journey of my life that I can never forget the amazing teachers who never failed to spare time to know if their students understood a particular topic and also apply facilities that make learning easier. It has been a very wonderful experience. I can't also forget the extracurricular activities that helped me participate in things I never thought I could do. And lastly, I can't forget the amazing friends I made at UPSS Schools.
Odubanjo Favour.Ex-student
Over the past three years of my life, UPSS Comprehensive College has given me a very nice experience. The environment, the teachers and the students have all greeted me well and contributed heavily to my secondary school years. Attending Pacific was really an impeccable decision on my part.
Abubakary HalimatEx-student
Previous
Next

Events

31 Jul

Summer School
